import React from 'react'; import './Card.css'; export default function Card ({min, max, name, img, onClose, id, temp}) { return (
{name}

{Math.ceil(temp - 273.15)}°

{/*---------------------------------------------- */}

{Math.floor(min - 273.15)}°{+ " "} /

{Math.floor(max - 273.15)}°

); };
